overview:
A creative guy with 13+ years of experience in various forms of media production including: web design / development, graphic design and computer animation. He’s lead, mentored, and participated in web, print and animation production teams comprised of in-house and/or out-sourced members.

You’ll typically find him (re)building dynamic / transactional websites. Whether it be on the front-end by creating object-oriented JavaScript, clean standards-based HTML and reusable CSS; or on the backend, creating scalable, object-oriented PHP and clean MySQL code.

degrees.subject: Media Arts and Animation
degrees.institution: The Art Institute of Fort Lauderdale
